title: Queensryche - Operation Livecrime (resequenced and expanded by }
description:
Queensryche
Operation: Livecrime/Building Empires

This is a more complete version of the Operation: Livecrime album that I put together using the remastered CD and the Building Empires video. The original CD was only the Mindcrime album live, while Building Empires contained six more songs from the same shows. Then the remastered CD came out with another song from the set. Now the only tracks missing from the Empire setlist are Best I Can, Empire and Jet City Woman (Hand On Heart was also played occasionally, but not at the shows taped for the album).

I did my best to master the Building Empires material to match the CD as well as possible. Everything is included, even some extra dialogue from the Livecrime video that wasn't on the CD (not much. just a thank you), and all in its proper order.


01 Resistance
02 Walk in the Shadows
03 The Thin Line
04 Roads to Madness
05 I Remember Now
06 Anarchy X
07 Revolution Calling
08 Operation: Mindcrime
09 Speak
10 Spreading the Disease
11 The mission
12 Suite: Sister Mary
13 The Needle Lieds
14 Elecreic Requiem
15 Breaking The Silence
16 I Don't Believe in Love
17 Waiting for 22
18 My Empty Room
19 Eyes of a Stranger
20 Take Hold of the Flame
21 The Lady Wore Black
22 Silent Lucidity
